info.name: Delta Office Chair PU
info.LongDescription:
The Delta is a big business office chair that works hard at delivering exceptional comfort and style at a great price. The padded seat is upholstered in a high quality white PU, which is easy to wipe down and keep clean. The seat cocoons the sitter with molded armrests and a high back for extra comfort. It sits on top of a sturdy base, which is constructed from steel for extra strength and durability. The Delta moves on nylon easy-glide castors and features gas-lift height adjustment as well as tilt and rocking mechanisms.

“Large, smart and comfortable, the Delta office chair is a perfect choice for any home office or study,” Freedom furniture buyer Lucie McCann.
